alert.note: Alert for McCook; Minnehaha (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 2:19PM MDT until May 04 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Minnehaha County in southeastern South Dakota... Eastern McCook County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 319 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Salem, or 10 miles northwest of Lake Vermillion State Recreation Area, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Canistota around 335 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Montrose and Lake Vermillion State Recreation Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
